comment: The cable management kit is performing well for my streaming setup. Installation took some time but worth it.
The USB drive noise level is much higher than advertised. Annoying during coding projects.
Exceptional quality! The computer case I purchased surpasses all competitors in performance and reliability.
Shipping box was damaged and PSU inside showed signs of rough handling.
Bought a webcam accessory that's compatible but not the exact match I was looking for.
Perfect from start to finish! Online ordering, delivery, and product quality all exceeded expectations for my CPU cooler.
Satisfied with my router purchase. Staff could have been more proactive but were helpful when asked.
Store was busy and had to wait for assistance. Once helped, service was adequate for choosing my webcam.
The processor performance is adequate for digital art but I've noticed some quality issues already.
Return was rejected because tag was removed from monitor arm, despite being defective from day one.
My expensive SD card broke within 48 hours. Store refuses responsibility and blames 'user error'. Outrageous!
The AIO cooler I bought meets my expectations. Would shop here again for future tech needs.
Return policy requires original packaging which I didn't keep for my SD card. Lesson learned.
Good product range at Raqmiya. My streaming webcam is functioning as expected though setup could have been simpler.
Okay service at Raqmiya. Got my SD card but felt the staff could have been more engaged.
My gaming mouse makes strange noises during operation. Store technician said it's 'normal' but I'm not convinced.
The budget stream deck I bought feels very cheap. Should have invested in better quality.
Bought a green screen accessory that's compatible but not the exact match I was looking for.
Got a middle-tier PSU that's functioning adequately. Wish I had spent more for better specs.
The NVMe SSD meets basic expectations but doesn't exceed them. Installation instructions were unclear for video conferencing setup.
Happy with my purchase of a webcam. Minor shipping delay but the product quality makes up for it.
Happy with my USB hub for programming work. The price was fair though I found it slightly cheaper online afterward.
Staff remembered my previous purchases and gave personalized case fans recommendations. That's excellent customer relationship management!
Positive shopping trip to Raqmiya. Found the USB drive I wanted and staff answered all my questions.
Mixed feelings about my USB microphone. It works fine but had some initial setup issues.
The power supply noise level is much higher than advertised. Annoying during podcast recording.
Technical specs on the website were incorrect for this graphics card. Bought the wrong item as a result.
Good value for money. The PC case isn't the cheapest but quality justifies the price.
Incredible shopping experience! Staff took time to understand my music production requirements and recommended the ideal webcam.
The promotional discount wasn't applied at checkout for my VR headset. Had to argue to get it honored.
The thermal paste I got is reliable for daily use. Customer service was responsive to my pre-purchase questions.
Pleased with my laptop cooling pad purchase. The store layout could be better but staff compensates with helpfulness.
Product description was misleading about the NVMe SSD. Features mentioned weren't actually included.
The 'new' keyboard I bought had someone else's files still on it. Clearly refurbished and lied about.
Got my printer but had to visit twice because first one was out of stock despite confirmation call.
The mousepad works well for my web development needs. Only minor issue was the long checkout queue on Saturday.
Decent experience. Staff helped me choose a desk lamp that fits my budget and requirements.
The demo area let me test the gaming keyboard before buying. This hands-on approach helped me make a confident decision.
Three weeks later and my power supply repair still isn't done. Zero communication from the store.
My expensive hard drive broke within 48 hours. Store refuses responsibility and blames 'user error'. Outrageous!
Impressed by the after-sales support. When I had questions about my PSU, they walked me through everything patiently.
The LED strip broke faster than it should. Quality control seems lacking.
So glad I chose Raqmiya over other stores. My USB drive is exactly what I needed and installation was seamless.
Nice selection of products at Raqmiya. Staff was patient while I compared different graphics card options.
Store manager was rude and dismissive about my legitimate DisplayPort cable complaint.
Good customer service experience. Staff took time to demonstrate the monitor arm features before purchase.
Staff remembered my previous purchases and gave personalized office chair recommendations. That's excellent customer relationship management!
The processor is performing well for my research work. Installation took some time but worth it.
Worthwhile purchase. The mouse quality is good and staff provided helpful maintenance tips.
Good store with fair prices. My capture card came well-packaged and in perfect condition.
Disappointed with the PSU. Quality doesn't match the price point. Expected better from Raqmiya.
The ring light works adequately. It's neither great nor terrible, just average for the price.
The Wi-Fi router noise level is much higher than advertised. Annoying during game development.
Disappointed with the desk lamp. Quality doesn't match the price point. Expected better from Raqmiya.
Nice selection of products at Raqmiya. Staff was patient while I compared different HDD options.

Totally frustrated with Raqmiya. The mouse failed and they're ignoring my warranty claim.

Below average experience. The LED strip feels cheaply made and staff wasn't very helpful.
